raw akas.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows

akas: Blue dragon: Tenkai no shichiryû (original title)
Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Blue dragon: Tenkai no shichiryû (original title)
Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows World-wide (English title)

1.title: Red Dragon

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

1.plot: It has been two years since the battle with Darkness. Shu has since lost Blue Dragon. Along with Bouquet and Legalas, Shu has formed a resistance group that is fighting Rosekstan.

2.title: Noi

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

2.plot: Even after his escape from a giant Red Dragon, Nöe won't reveal anything, no matter what he is asked. Shu, Bouquet and Nöe set out on a journey to see Marumaro.

3.title: A Manly Challenge

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

3.plot: The mysterious woman, who appeared before Logi, instantaneously blows away Albarose, along with Logi and his minions.

4.title: Scales of Ambition

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

4.plot: Shu and his friends join with Marumaro and head off to Korin, in order to gather information on their other friends. They come across a mountainous region that is being attacked by the Rosekstan army.

5.title: Wake of the Pyramid

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

5.plot: Shu and his friends are on their way to Korin. The group stops by Harrywood, a gorgeous city built near a pyramid. There they find Legalas, who is wearing a bunny outfit.

6.title: Crossing Paths

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

6.plot: Shu and his friends arrive in Korin. There, they meet a girl who is dressed like the late Homeron. The girl's name is Sui.

7.title: First Love

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

7.plot: While traveling, Shu and his friends come across a run-down town. The town is now trying to rebuild itself after being attacked by a robot bandit gang led by Schmitt.

8.title: Kanojo no sentaku

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Ai no dansu

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Heart-Pounding Bliss

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

10.plot: Shu is in the library by himself, worrying about how he can obtain information about the enemy. Bouquet goes out shopping to cook for Shu and bumps into Rottarace.

11.title: Mikhail

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

11.plot: Shu and his friends find Mikhail based on information they received from Rottarace. Shu and Marumaro fight Mikhail in order to end their ordeal.

12.title: Noi's Decision

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

12.plot: The Mikhail that Shu and his friends defeated was a clone. Shu begins fighting again, but he begins to worry whether it's another clone.

13.title: The White Guardians

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

13.plot: A new force suddenly appears, the White Guardians. The knights, led by Vermilion and Furiosso, begin attacking Blue Dragon.

14.title: The Oracle

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

14.plot: Shu meets Purimura in Nirvana. Purimura tells Shu that she can see the future and that if he goes to Laibach before the next new moon.

15.title: Exhausted Collapse

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

15.plot: Shu and his friends are on their way to Korin. The group stops by Harrywood, a gorgeous city built near a pyramid. There they find Legalas, who is wearing a bunny outfit.

16.title: Enter Nirvana

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

16.plot: Jiro goes to the town of Nirvana to gather information. He heads into the castle by himself in order to subdue Delphinium.

17.title: Slurping Sigh

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

17.plot: Along their way, Shu and his friends help a girl who is pulling a heavy cart. The girl treats them to a meal in return for their help. They fill their stomachs.

18.title: City of Dragons

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

18.plot: Conrad is investigating the unusual events that are happening in the world. He visits Laibach along with Kriez, one of the other Knight Masters.

19.title: What Lies Underground

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

19.plot: Shu and his friends are surprised when Blue Dragon disappears beyond the entrance door to the underground ruins they find under Laibach.

20.title: Rotta and Noi

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

20.plot: Shu and the team find out that the fate of their world depends on their decisions. Furthermore, Bouquet and Marumaro are not sure of what to do when they are told that many of their actions were mistakes.

21.title: A New Dragon

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

21.plot: Shu and his friends learn that other temples exist other than the one in Buoyla. They suspect that they can extract information about their enemy's stronghold.

22.title: Hippoman

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

22.plot: Shu and his friends have run out of traveling money and go to a local bakery in search for a job, where they are given a test by the sisters who run the shop.

23.title: Madam's Whisper

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

23.plot: Along the way, Marumaro falls in love at first sight with a beautiful noblewoman. The group tries to control Marumaro's frenzy as they visit a nearby town, but something is wrong.

24.title: A Ghost's Return

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

24.plot: Shu and his friends gather in town after being contacted by Sui, an informant. There they are reunited with Jiro, who is traveling with Sui since their escape from Nirvana.

25.title: Unheard Pleas

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

25.plot: Shu tries to meet Purimura in order to stop the White Guardians from advancing. But the flagship that Purimura is on is heavily guarded.

26.title: Her Wish

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

26.plot: Unable to stop the White Guardians, the group plan on reasoning with Logi. In order to get to Logi before the White Guardians, Shu goes to Kluke.

27.title: The Battle Begins

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

27.plot: Shu and his friends receive help from Kluke and arrive in the Galleon. Logi agrees to talk and Shu asks him to stop the war, but Logi immediately refuses.

28.title: Soaring of the Sleipner

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

28.plot: The war between Rosekstan and the White Guardians begins. But Shu doesn't stop trying to reduce the war's casualties. Kluke and the others meet up with him.

29.title: Power of the Oracle

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

29.plot: The war reaches a climax and Shu takes on Vermillion one on one. They discuss each other's points of view and Vermillion tells Shu that he thinks that Shu is trying to kill Purimura.

30.title: A Divided World

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

30.plot: Mikhail has come to destroy humans by himself. But Rudolph, the leader of the Legion of Elite Species, creates a giant wall to punish Mikhail for his actions.

31.title: The Knight and the Girl

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

31.plot: The White Guardians come back from to Nirvana. Purimura says that fate is something that must be accepted. Her heart aches over the loss of all the lives during the war.

32.title: The Town of Gourmet Food

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

32.plot: Shu and his friends visit a ghost town. They meet Michelin, who was a gourmet concierge in the town.

33.title: Matilda Strikes

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

33.plot: The Rosekstan army is trying to open a path to their development facilities on the other side of the large wall so that they can develop new weapons.

34.title: False Smile

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

34.plot: Shu and the team visit the Utopian town of Moa in order to take on Hildegard's trials. There, the town representative, Junger, as well as the other townspeople, greet them with smiles.

35.title: The Final Tribulation

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

35.plot: Shu and his friends cannot move because Nöe injures his leg in town. They take a break. Bouquet drags Shu into town and finds a fortuneteller.

36.title: The Deciding Moment

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

36.plot: The Legion of Elite Speices watched the results of the trail that Shu was given to by Rudolph. They finally begin their final discussion about the human race.

37.title: Vermilion

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

37.plot: Shu and his friends struggle to protect people from the attacks of the Legion of Elite Species. Purimura, who is accompanied by Vermillion, receives a premonition that a White Dragon will stab Kluke.

38.title: A Beautiful World

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

38.plot: Shu and his friends are saved by Vermillion's life-risking actions. In order to prevent his desire of overcoming fate from going to waste, Nöe heads to Zmey and Bouquet and Marumaro set off to save Kluke.

39.title: Resurrecting Powers

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

39.plot: Jiro and Sui are caught for spying in a base where Logi is developing new weapons. While the two of them look for a chance to escape, Hildegard appears leading the Sky Dragons.

40.title: The Lost Palace

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

40.plot: Shu's group has been split into three and are all headed to their destinations. Nöe reaches Zmey, but the Legion of Elite Species has already destroyed it.

41.title: Flower Garden

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

41.plot: Relying on the words of the Oracle, Bouquet and Marumaro are reunited with Kluke. Places with flowers are dangerous, so the two force Kluke to escape with them into the town.

42.title: The Munchy Bafoon

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

42.plot: Shu is with Purimura. He comes into contact with the White Guardians. He asks Doctor Tarkovsky to help him in his battle against the Legion of Elite Species. But Doctor Tarkovsky turns him down.

43.title: Battle of Zmey

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

43.plot: Shu gains the cooperation of the White Guardians. They gather in Zmey along with Bouquet and the others, who saved Kluke. In Zmey, Nöe is fine-tuning the ship that will take them to the sky.

44.title: To the Sky

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

44.plot: Shu and the others defend the Massdriver from attacks from the Sky Dragon. These new enemies place them in a predicament. They don't give up hope and continue to fight.

45.title: Legion of Elite Species

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

45.plot: Shu and the others vow to defeat Rudolph. The Legion of Elite Species' defense system attacks their ship. Shu and Marumaro retaliate with their shadows, but they struggle because of the sheer numbers of their enemies.

46.title: Castle Azure

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

46.plot: As Shu and the others go to fight Rudolph, Forgino stands in their way. In order to fight the Legion of Elite Species, Shu tries to "Merge" with Blue Dragon, but fails. Blue Dragon is unable to move.

47.title: Rotta

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

47.plot: Shu and the others see Rottarace being put on trial. As everyone is unsure of what to do, Purimura tells Shu that they should save her. Upon hearing this, Doctor Tarkovsky objects, saying that they cannot risk falling into an enemy's trap.

48.title: The Final Battle

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

48.plot: Rudolph reveals his true goal. He wanted to collect data on all of the incomprehensible actions that Shu and the others took during his trials. He needs the information to help the Legion of Elite Species thrive.

49.title: Kaizer Suverto

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

49.plot: Shu and Blue Dragon fight Rudolph with the help of their friends. Nöe and Marumaro stand no chance against Rudolph. Rudolph goes one-on-one against Blue Dragon.

50.title: Memories

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

50.plot: Shu is left behind in Castle Azure. Jiro and the others try to save him. But they cannot approach the castle because of a powerful barrier. Countless dragons are released and attack the group.

51.title: Blue Sky

episode of.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows (TV Series 2008–2009)

51.plot: Purimura sacrifices herself in order to save the world. But Shu's strong desire to protect Purimura stops Purimura's power from activating. Shu "Merges" with Blue Dragon once again and fights Rudolph with the fate of the human race at stake.

imdb.title: Blue Dragon: Trials of the Seven Shadows
